name: Climate Career Corps
description: The Climate Career Corps is designed for youth to accelerate solutions to climate change and acquire green skills for future success in any job they choose. Climate Career Corps youth interns will: Gain direct work experiences in a range of climate-focused organizations Learn about environmental issues Gain appreciation for the value of nature in our cities Build green skills that can be applied to their professional and personal lives Inspire and help build a movement that fuels climate solutio

howToGetIt: Complete the General Job Readiness Training Interest Form (https://enterpriseforyouth.formstack.com/forms/efyinterest) or sign up in person by stopping by our Career Lab location.
